Make a difference by being exactly who y: Make a difference by being exactly who you are.
The reason why I started__: The reason why I started a business is to bring world-class talents together for a greater possibility.
Enjoy unlimited coffee, tea and other dr: Enjoy unlimited coffee, tea and other drinks as well as snacks
Believe in Honesty, Accountability and T: Believe in Honesty, Accountability and Trust
By developing connections and actively__: By developing connections and actively working in our worldwide offices — through joining CloudMile activities, meeting people and sharing your knowledge — you will identify yourself as a global player and establish your own international presence.
We’ve partnered with global industry-lea: We’ve partnered with global industry-leading strategic and solution partners, such as Google Cloud, Cloudflare, elastic, workplace, CHIEF, LucidWorks. You’ll have the opportunity to work with the best talent to achieve the greatest heights of your career faster.
Work & Learn Hard Together, but Party Ha: Work & Learn Hard Together, but Party Harder
We welcome and nurture people who love t: We welcome and nurture people who love to work and learn. Our employees can enjoy the benefits of furthering their skills through professional development, education and training, as well as opportunities for training overseas. But more importantly, we organize many events to enjoy together.
Whether it’s a meeting room, a balcony,: Whether it’s a meeting room, a balcony, or even a bar outside, wherever you bring your MacBook, is your office. Need to refuel and recharge? We offer employees unlimited free coffee and all kinds of snacks. With all these environments, we make for CloudMiler, navigate our work, and life functions are diverse, unlimited, and far-reaching.
Now deliver your resume to__: Now deliver your resume to hr@mile.cloud. After internal review, qualified candidates will be further invited for an interview.
